price: (Nkͻmhyεni), kasε: “Medeε Adiyisεm no na mede bͻ mo kͻkͻ, na ͻsosifoͻ no deε, sε yεbͻ no kͻkͻ mpo a ͻnnte frε no.“
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أُنذِرُكُم بِٱلۡوَحۡيِۚ وَلَا يَسۡمَعُ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا مَا يُنذَرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul innamā undhirukum bil-waḥyi walā yasmaʿu al-ṣumu al-duʿāa idhā mā yundharūna
